text: This is a list of governors-general of Antigua and Barbuda. The head of state is the Monarchy of Antigua and Barbuda. Most of the jobs though are done by the Governor-General. ==Governors-General of Antigua and Barbuda, 1981-present== *Sir Wilfred Jacobs: November 1, 1981–June 10, 1993 *James Carlisle: June 10, 1993–June 30, 2007 *Louise Lake-Tack: July 17, 2007—August 14, 2014 *Rodney Williams: August 14, 2014— Antigua and Barbuda *
title: List of governors-general of Antigua and Barbuda
